title: How to write a letter to the principal on items needed in school - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends greatly on what your relationship is with this principal. The more familiar you are with this person, the more informal you can be in your style of writing. Assuming it’s a more formal relationship, I’d suggest all the tips here work well: Writing persuasive request letters: business letter format, tips and samples Finally I have a comment on being persuasive overall. You need to be on the same side as the principal. Do not take an antagonistic or confrontational tone. Be sure that you align your goals with your principal’s goals, and you’ll be much more persuasive.
